name: Habilis
overview:
We Provide Lifestyle Management and Virtual Assistants to help you stay shipshape at all times. Making appointments, booking flights, even sending out flowers - we do all this and more. Or, you could use us for your work side of things (think presentations, competitor analysis, web research).

Simply put, we are at your service 24/7/365.

At Habilis, our goal is to help you make the most out of every single day.

We take care of the little things in your life so you can focus on the bigger, more important ones. Tell us what you need to get done and as long as it can be done over the phone or the internet, we can do it.

And, because we have a large team of people who are great at time management and getting things done (even if we do say so ourselves!), once you leave it with Habilis, consider it done.

Tasks suitable for delegation include: â€¢ Minor and repetitive decisions. â€¢ Tasks you are expert in and that others should learn. â€¢ Tasks for which you are least qualified, but that others could learn. â€¢ Tasks you dislike, provided someone else likes them (delegation should not be an excuse to dump unpleasant tasks). â€¢ Tasks that add variety and interest to another personâ€™s role. â€¢ Tasks that will increase the number of people who can perform critical assignments.
